datafield.subfield: American Association of State Highway Officials.
Special Committee on Urban Planning Seminars
American Association of State Highway Officials.

The Special Committee on Urban Planning Seminars of the American Association of State Highway Officials was established in 1960. In 1962 the name was changed to Sub-committee on Urban Transportation Planning, in 1968 to Urban Transportation Planning, Socio-economic and Environmental Factors Committee, in 1970 to Administrative Sub-committee on Urban Affairs and Socio-economic Factors, and in 1973 to Planning Sub-committee on Environmental, Social and Economic Affairs under the American Association of State Highway and Transportation Officials.
Info. rec'd from G. Sharp, AASHTO
(1960-61, AASHO Special Committee on Urban Planning Seminars)
